title: 09/16: Week 2 Recap - Mahomes, Fitzpatrick and More Standouts (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Let's rank some QBs (2:30)! Is Patrick Mahomes #1 overall? Top 3? Is Ryan Fitzpatrick legit? And while we're at it let's rank some WRs and RBs as well before we tell you this week's winners (14:36) like Phillip Lindsay and Chris Hogan and losers (20:40) like David Johnson and the replacement TEs you may have depended on, and what about DeMaryius Thomas? ... The big news you need to know about (26:33) which of course includes some Josh Gordon advice. We also give some fun stats (32:46) and play Buy or Sell (34:50) ... Recapping every game (38:06)! How are we feeling about Antonio Brown, Dalvin Cook, Derrick Henry, Robert Woods and so many more? ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
This episode is sponsored by www.ZipRecruiter.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
